comments_since_last_sample.body:
No mention of screen tearing. That's a first for the Xbox.

Good to hear that bug seem to be finally solved out, as I'm not so worried how VRR will impact PS5 now. If it ever gets it.. ;)

I just finished it on PS5.... gotta say, I probably would have enjoyed it more on PC.  Quality mode does look better, but Performance still had a lot of hiccups.  It is not well opitmized on console at all..... i'm wondering how RT will work, if they ever do release it for consoles.
The only thing not great about the art design is Quill's hairdo.
No such thing as story-driven; it's either a player-driven game w/ a plot-pulled story, or a player-driven game w/ a character-pulled story.

I really like it overall but Starlord feels like he's always shouting, my only real complaint. 

Can't wait for the PC analysis
OMG I love that digital foundry helps me to decide in which way to play. Thank you!!!!
I'm enjoying it has little bugs but overall they did a great job looks stunning 😍
Played on my decrepit PC, medium settings, 1440p. Rarely got more than 35fps, but it never felt bad or unresponsive
I just find it incredible that these so called next gen machines can't run a 4k resolution at 60fps,are they just not powerful enough.
